特記事項: 【合併】総合日本学習科目（Japanese Economy and Business)（CIEC）/Japanese Economy and Business（国際学部）
授業方法: Seminar.Based on weekly readings and class discussions, students will gain an understanding of characteristics and phenomena of the Japanese economy and Japanese business. By discussing real world cases of business success and failure in Japan and practicing cross-cultural communication techniques, students will also develop a portfolio of best practices in business communication and management. At the beginning of each class, students will present a summary of the assigned readings followed by class discussions, which are supplemented by materials from the instructor.
